mapper.insert:
insert into project
pid,
publisher,
create-time,
close-time,
state,
name,
field,
language,
description,
#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update project
publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create-time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
close-time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
field = #{field,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project set publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create-time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, close-time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, field = #{field,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
